-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `package`.`users_details`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `package`.`users_data` (
  `id_users_data` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `first_name` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `last_name` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `address` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `city` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `post_code` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `phone` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id_users_data`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `package`.`users`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `package`.`users` (
  `id_users` BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `login` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `password` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
  `email` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id_users`),
  UNIQUE INDEX `login_UNIQUE` (`login` ASC) VISIBLE,
  UNIQUE INDEX `email_UNIQUE` (`email` ASC) VISIBLE)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `package`.`delivery_man`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `package`.`delivery_man` (
  `idDelivery_man` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `firstName` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `lastName` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `phone` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idDelivery_man`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `package`.`package_info`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `package`.`package_info` (
  `idPackage_info` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `delivery_man_id_delivery_man` INT NOT NULL,
  `users_users_details_id_users_details` INT NOT NULL,
  `get_users_users_details_id_users_details1` INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idPackage_info`, `delivery_man_id_delivery_man`, `users_users_details_id_users_details`, `get_users_users_details_id_users_details1`),
  INDEX `fk_package_info_delivery_man1_idx` (`delivery_man_id_delivery_man` ASC) VISIBLE,
  INDEX `fk_package_info_users1_idx` (`users_users_details_id_users_details` ASC) VISIBLE,
  INDEX `fk_package_info_users2_idx` (`get_users_users_details_id_users_details1` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_package_info_delivery_man1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`delivery_man_id_delivery_man`)
    REFERENCES `package`.`delivery_man` (`idDelivery_man`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_id_users_details_sender`
    FOREIGN KEY (`users_users_details_id_users_details`)
    REFERENCES `package`.`users_data` (`id_users_data`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_id_users_details_customer`
    FOREIGN KEY (`get_users_users_details_id_users_details1`)
    REFERENCES `package`.`users_data` (`id_users_data`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;
